attributes.action: allow the Carers Allowance to continue being paid when a Carer becomes a Pensioner. The Pension is our Right and is not a benefit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A Carer is paid an allowance which upon he/she becoming a Pensioner is immediately stopped on the grounds that your Pension is a benefit. This is not so, Our Pension is our Right and we have paid for it all our working lives and we should continue to get the Carers Allowance as well.
